instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: Run 'yarn add framer-motion recharts lucide-react date-fns react-day-picker clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot @radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu @radix-ui/react-dialog @radix-ui/react-avatar @radix-ui/react-separator @radix-ui/react-tooltip @radix-ui/react-popover @radix-ui/react-select @radix-ui/react-label @radix-ui/react-checkbox @radix-ui/react-switch @radix-ui/react-tabs @radix-ui/react-scroll-area'.
2. UPDATE CSS: Replace the contents of '/app/frontend/src/index.css' with the CSS variables derived from the 'colors' section above (convert Hex to HSL).
3. FONT SETUP: Add the Google Fonts import to the top of 'index.css'.
4. LAYOUT: Create a 'Layout.js' component that includes the Sidebar (Left) and Navbar (Top). The Sidebar must use the Primary Color (#0A2A43).
5. DASHBOARD: Implement the 'Control Room' grid. Use 'recharts' for the analytics widgets.
6. TABLES: Create a reusable 'DataTable' component with sorting, filtering, and pagination. Use the 'Table' styles defined above.
7. FORMS: Use 'react-hook-form' with 'zod' for validation. Style inputs using the 'Input' styles.
8. AUTH: Create a Login page with the 'login_bg' image as a side panel or background.
9. DATA-TESTID: Ensure EVERY interactive element (buttons, inputs, links) has a 'data-testid' attribute (e.g., 'login-submit-btn', 'client-table-row-1').
10. MOCK DATA: Since the backend might not be fully populated, create a 'mockData.js' file to populate the dashboard and tables for the MVP.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: DO NOT use generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle textures.
Ensure high contrast for text. Use 'text-slate-900' for headings and 'text-slate-600' for body.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a modern, geometric feel.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all financial data, IDs, and code snippets.
Add 'framer-motion' layout animations to all page transitions.
Never leave an empty state blank. Use an illustration or icon with a helpful message.
The Sidebar should be collapsible on mobile.
